articles.author: Rebecca Santana
articles.title: New program lets private citizens sponsor refugees in US - The Associated Press - en Español
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Everyday Americans will be able to help refugees adjust to life in the U.S. in a program being launched by the State Department as a way to give private citizens a role in resettling the thousands of refugees who arrive every year.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Everyday Americans will be able to help refugees adjust to life in the U.S. in a program being launched by the State Department as a way to give private citizens a role in resettling … [+2541 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Defending champion Nadal knocked out of Australian Open - News24
articles.description: Defending champion and top seed Rafael Nadal crashed out of the Australian Open in round two to 65th-ranked American Mackenzie McDonald in a major upset.
articles.content:
Defending champion Rafael Nadal crashed out of the Australian Open in round two to 65th-ranked American Mackenzie McDonald in a major upset on Wednesday, his worst Grand Slam result in seven years.
